Summary: This is a fake but looks very convincing.
divs: sighting detailsi was filming the beautiful desert landscapes out the window over texas using my blackberry pearl on my flight from raleigh to las vegas and my bberry light was on by default. the "spheres" are my bberry light. the 3 panes in the window, each slightly apart from each other created what looks exactly like 3 separate moving lights\spheres\orbs in the sky. to get them to do formations, i turned the phone clockwise\anticlockwise and nearer & farther from the window. it's amazing that the phone never exposes itself in the window at any time easily concealing the source of the effect. i've easily fooled people into believing they're ufos....amazing! i'm uploading this to educate the public on videos shot from aircraft windows because my footage immediately discounted the authencity of videos i had previously seen with similar lights (red\blue\white) shot from choppers & planes. since i was flying to nevada, the "evidence" could easily have pointed to area 51 activity. no doubt there are real cases of ufos existing. this is not one of them. enjoy! best regards, -kenz- ps. i own the copyright to this video but am giving mufon permission to post it\publish it wherever you want given the credit of: "kenz desai 2009. thekenz@hotmail.com"
trends: There have been no other sightings in Somewhere over Texas
This sighting has never been favorited.
